channel.title: 《Input Chinese on Nokia 770 with SCIM》的评论

My e-mail is iamjushua@gmail.com ,thank you very much.

item.title: 作者：wolfg
item.dc:creator: wolfg
item.description:
Hi there,
As a new feature of the next release of MaemoCJK, you can switch to the original VKB at runtime. So you can write your code with it. But for the function keys F1-F12, is there any need for them?
item.content:encoded:
Hi there,

As a new feature of the next release of MaemoCJK, you can switch to the original VKB at runtime. So you can write your code with it. But for the function keys F1-F12, is there any need for them?

item.title: 作者：ken-xchen
item.dc:creator: ken-xchen
item.description:
Hi, Wolfg,
Many thanks for your excellent work on SCIM on n800. the virtual keyboard is just like normal key board but with these keys missing:
1. [ ] { } 2. DEL Insert Home End PageUp/Down 3. Function Keys F1-F12
Is there any way to input at least [ ] { } ? without them, it's impossible to write any script or C code. Thanks again.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, Wolfg,

Many thanks for your excellent work on SCIM on n800. the virtual keyboard is just like normal key board but with these keys missing:

1. [ ] { }
2. DEL Insert Home End PageUp/Down
3. Function Keys F1-F12

Is there any way to input at least [ ] { } ? without them, it's impossible to write any script or C code. Thanks again.

item.title: 作者：Dengou
item.dc:creator: Dengou
item.description: 我的770,安装scim-拼音正常,但是却无法弹出中文. 已经在设置中操作过很多次,也能看到关于拼音的设置,但就只是能输入英文. 还有安装了输入法后发现没有enter键了. 卸载后安装7M的scim大文件(有n多输入法,但是没有拼音)后能够却能正常使用. 是否有解决方案?
item.content:encoded:
我的770,安装scim-拼音正常,但是却无法弹出中文.
已经在设置中操作过很多次,也能看到关于拼音的设置,但就只是能输入英文.
还有安装了输入法后发现没有enter键了.
卸载后安装7M的scim大文件(有n多输入法,但是没有拼音)后能够却能正常使用.
是否有解决方案?

item.title: 作者：mpouse
item.dc:creator: mpouse
item.description: Recently , I have also been porting a program to N800.I have made the program work in the scratchbox in debian linux.But I ran into some problems when I parted the program into N800 device.It says the debian package is "unable to install. Incompatible package".Have you ever encountered this problem? I need you help.You can contact me by email . thank you.
item.content:encoded:
Recently , I have also been porting a program to N800.I have made the program work in the scratchbox in debian linux.But I ran into some problems when I parted the program into N800 device.It says the debian package is "unable to install. Incompatible package".Have you ever encountered this problem?
I need you help.You can contact me by email
.
thank you.

item.title: 作者：henry
item.dc:creator: henry
item.description: 借问一下，除了SCIM之外还有没有别的输入法啊？这个输入法实在是太耗资源了。 我装完这个输入法，速度马上降了70%，然后就是很多特殊符号都找不到怎么输入了，非常不方便。
item.content:encoded: 借问一下，除了SCIM之外还有没有别的输入法啊？这个输入法实在是太耗资源了。 我装完这个输入法，速度马上降了70%，然后就是很多特殊符号都找不到怎么输入了，非常不方便。

item.title: 作者：jxf
item.dc:creator: jxf
item.description:
Title bar works ok now. Thanks.
I do have scim-pinyin installed. In SCIM setup, I can see 'Chinese (simplified)' and '智能拼音'. I tried to check either one of them. But no matter which one I checked, I can only get 'other - raw code' at the keyboard input. Hope you have a solution for this.
item.content:encoded:
Title bar works ok now. Thanks.

I do have scim-pinyin installed. In SCIM setup, I can see 'Chinese (simplified)' and '智能拼音'. I tried to check either one of them. But no matter which one I checked, I can only get 'other - raw code' at the keyboard input. Hope you have a solution for this.

item.title: 作者：wolfg
item.dc:creator: wolfg
item.description:
1) This seems to be a bug for 770 if scim-pinyin has been installed. I still don't know its reason. Try to reinstall or make pinyin checked in SCIM setup program. Good Luck!
2) For title bar, you need to install a new theme "themes-zh-14pt".
http://maemo.guoyong.org/themes-zh-14pt.install
item.content:encoded:
1) This seems to be a bug for 770 if scim-pinyin has been installed. I still don't know its reason. Try to reinstall or make pinyin checked in SCIM setup program. Good Luck!

2) For title bar, you need to install a new theme "themes-zh-14pt".

http://maemo.guoyong.org/themes-zh-14pt.install

item.title: 作者：jxf
item.dc:creator: jxf
item.description:
Successfully installed this time. But I still have a couple of questions:
1) The keyboard has been changed. But I can't find an option for keying Chinese characters. There is only an option for 'raw code' under 'other'. How do I turn on Chinese input?
2) When I browse a Chinese page, I can see all the Chinese characters in the page, but not in the title bar. How do I solve this?
Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
Successfully installed this time. But I still have a couple of questions:

1) The keyboard has been changed. But I can't find an option for keying Chinese characters. There is only an option for 'raw code' under 'other'. How do I turn on Chinese input?

2) When I browse a Chinese page, I can see all the Chinese characters in the page, but not in the title bar. How do I solve this?

Thanks.
